api_list.api_description: Retrieve trace information from Cloudflare including IP Address, Timestamp, User Agent, Country Code, and more.

optional_parameters.name: endpoint
optional_parameters.description: The endpoint URL to query Cloudflare trace information.

api_list.api_description: Get information about a specific host.

required_parameters.name: host
required_parameters.description: The host to query (IPv4 address, hostname, or domain name).

query: What is my current IP address and can you provide details about the host using this IP?
